OrganizationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

OrganizationObjectID.type: WID,  Company_Reference_ID,  Cost_Center_Reference_ID,  Custom_Organization_Reference_ID,  Organization_Reference_ID,  Region_Reference_ID
OrganizationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

OrganizationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Holds the Organization for which Organization Reference ID is going to be changed.

validation.validation: The proposed reference id is already in use on a different organization. Duplicate reference ids are not allowed because the reference id must be unique for integrations.

Organization_Reference_ID_Reference_Data.description: Organization Name. This field is read-only and should not be post back in Put Organization ID Request.

This option is only allowed for Supervisory Organization at the moment. When set to true, Supervisory Organizations will have Organization Reference ID suffixed to their names. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of current moment.

validation.validation: 'Include Organization ID in Name' can only be set to true for supervisory organizations.

description: Holds data for Organization Reference ID
